transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello good morning sir, mai khushi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Sir aapne kal call kari thi na 9696 ki to kya issue tha aapne call kari thi sir?
Customer: Ha madam actually jo mera aane ke jo customer ke liye jo call number number galat dala hua hai.
Executive: Galat dala hai?
Customer: Ha madam jo inquiry aani chahiye kaunsa number hai bataiye yahi number hai?
Executive: Mai keh rahi hu jo aapke paas direct call aati hai usme aap keh rahe ki number galat dala hai.
Customer: Ha. Mere paas koi call aayi nahi raha wahi bol raha kaunsa aap thoda check karenge?
Executive: Sir ab sir parso hi to aapki service live hui hai. Ekdam se thodi na sir aapko matlab call vagera aana start ho jayega. Abhi ye batao ki aapki service jo hai sir 17 November 2025 ko live hui hai. Aaj dusra din hai sir. Thik hai? Aur aapko mai bata deti hu abhi aapki service live hui hai to obviously baat hai na sir ki aap abhi abhi pura dekhoge tabhi aapke paas calls aayenge. Kam se kam one week ya one month to wait karna padta hai na sir.
Customer: Okay, right right right right.
Executive: Haanji aur number kya keh rahe ho kuch galat hai? Bataiye kaunsa galat hai? Dekho mai aapko bata deti hu aapke jo PNS number hai na usme do number hai ek hai 672 ek hai 131. Thik hai?
Customer: To yahi number hai na sir?
Executive: Aapke number to sahi hai aapka.
Customer: Ek ek minute ruko mai aapko.
Executive: Mai keh rahi hu aapko aur number bhi add karne hai kya?
Customer: Ek minute madam. Mera ek minute chalu hai.
Executive: Kya keh rahe ho sir?
Customer: Ha madam mere ko kal ye madam number kiska hai 079?
Executive: Hello? Matlab aapka jo concern tha sir aapne yahi bola na ki aapko calls nahi aa rahi. To mai aapko ye bata deti hu sir ki aapko calls kyun nahi aa rahi. 909 aapne jo number wohi to hai na?
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Aaj theek aapne bola number dono sahi hai. Aur hello mere paas jo inquiry aayegi woh kaunse category ki aayegi bataiye. Nature of business mera kya dala hai?
Executive: Ek minute sir mai aapko bata deti hu aapka business kya dala hai ek minute.
Executive: Sir yahi dala hai na aapka CNG profile cutting service MS washer mild steel profile. Thik hai? MS profile cutting service profile cutting service. Yahi hai na?
Customer: Aur madam usme ye bhi likha tha cutting cutting me category me ye bhi daliye ki raw material mere paas 6 mm se 250 tak MS aur C45 dono available rehta hai. Woh category ka mai supply kar sakta hu aisa woh bhi rehna chahiye.
Customer: MS plate.
Executive: Aapne mai aapko bata deti hu aapne kaun kaunsi category ko add kara hai. Ek hai oxy fuel cutting thik hai. CNG profile cutting service MS washer mild steel profile MS profile cutting service profile cutting service carbon steel plates metal baskets ho gaye MS plates ho gaye MS steel pharma cutting.
Customer: Right.
Executive: Sir aapki na voice break ho rahi hai ajeeb si ho rahi hai thodi thoda aap loud bol sakte hai?
Customer: Ek ek ek ek minute madam mai mai mai mere car me hu mai ek minute abhi.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha boliye. Ha boliye. Ha abhi break nahi ho raha. Aap iske alawa ye bhi daliye madam ke mai 6 mm plate se laga ke 260 all size mere paas in house me stock rehta hai.
Executive: A jo aapko aur category add karni hai na sir. Hello?
Customer: Ha MS MS plate aur C45 plate likhiye MS plate aur C45 plate 6 mm se 260 mm tak all size stock rehta hai mere paas.
Executive: MS plates ki baat kar rahe hai sir woh to aapka mention hai ye hai sir 12 mm MS square plate 5 mm MS.
Customer: Nahi madam madam madam madam woh product ho gaya woh cutting hone ke baad product ho gaya.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Hello meri baat suniye woh woh product ho gaya madam plate ke andar se tukda kaata to ring ho gaya score kaata to score ho gaya plate kaata to plate ho gaya ye product ho gaya lekin kisko plate bhi lagta hai to usko.
Executive: Sir ji MS plates hai na woh aapki category add hai. Thik hai?
Customer: Lekin woh madam usme size bhi dalo na thickness 6 mm se 260 tak all size.
Executive: Okay to sir woh to mai aapki size jo hai na sir specifications pe aapka mention kar dungi thik hai catalog par thik hai?
Customer: Right right ye bhi dal do MS plate 267 260 aur C45 bhi kyuki ye bhi koi bhi aadmi dekhta to profile ko chod ke kabhi plate ki jarurat padi to woh bhi mere paas aa sakta hai.
Executive: Kitne mm ka bataya aapne sir?
Customer: 6 mm se 260.
Executive: 6 mm to 260 all size. All size milega. 260 all size to aapka na mai MS pe MS category me jaake usme specification ka option aata hai to waha pe select karke aapka mai mention kar dungi thik hai?
Customer: Right right right right madam.
Executive: To ye category add karni hai na already ye category aapki add hai bas aapne ye bataya hai ki mujhe size ka hai to size add karna hai to woh mai kar deti hu thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai madam thank you madam.
Executive: Thik hai sir mai woh aapka size add kar deti hu 6 mm to 250 mm right?
Customer: Right right right.
Executive: Thik hai mai kar deti hu okay sir thank you.
Customer: Okay madam okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer stated incorrect contact number on profile.

- Customer is not receiving any calls.

- Wants to add MS plate and C45 plate sizes.



Resolution:

- Executive verified the contact numbers.

- Executive explained the service was recently activated.

- Executive agreed to add MS plate and C45 plate sizes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will add the sizes to the catalog.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, catalog, profile, business category
